rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 22 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 7:30 PM, 27 June 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Pampanga, Tarlac, Rizal and Laguna within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Nueva Ecija(General Tinio, Gabaldon), Bulacan(Dona Remedios Trinidad), Quezon(Panukulan, Burdeos, Polillo, Patnanungan, Jomalig) and Zambales(Palauig, Iba) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
